title: High School Memorabilia
content: [](http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/1134/545/1600/kirbyschool.png)We'd changed the name to International School by the time I got there, but this decal and slogan remained omnipresent and indelible. This was in Metro Manila. I'm a member of the alumni association and have managed to make a reunion or two. Plus I'm still in touch with a multi-national [cast of characters](http://mathforum.org/kb/thread.jspa?threadID=1313602), including many in high places (ka-ching).
author: Kirby Urner
